citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Currently, heartworm prevention is not being given to adult dogs in accordance with the Program of Veterinary Care
(PVC). The licensee states he has some Ivermectin but he is not using it. Heartworm disease is a parasitic infection
spread by mosquitos to dogs. Dogs affected may cough or show signs of pain or discomfort. Each dealer shall use
appropriate methods to prevent diseases as established in the PVC. Correct by: ensuring appropriate dogs are given
monthly heartworm preventative as stated in the PVC starting April 1, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Currently, heartworm prevention is not being given to adult dogs in accordance with the Program of Veterinary Care 
(PVC). The licensee states he has some Ivermectin but he is not using it. Heartworm disease is a parasitic infection 
spread by mosquitos to dogs. Dogs affected may cough or show signs of pain or discomfort. Each dealer shall use 
appropriate methods to prevent diseases as established in the PVC. Correct by: ensuring appropriate dogs are given 
monthly heartworm preventative as stated in the PVC starting April 1, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
